item.description:
Suzy Spivey, presenter at our May Meetup, is back with us, this time on the phone. 

Bring your burning questions re:

- how to A.C.T. on your "daring" dreams

- any other questions you might have (e.g. re: life purpose, following your bliss etc..)

Thank you very much, Suzy, for your gift of wisdom & time this evening.

 

(1) Download copy of Suzy's MAY Meetup presentation

(i) Go here to download: http://www.meetup.com/lawofattraction-us/files/
ii) Log in
iii) Open & print  pdf "BostonLoA_051011_Suzy Spivey"

(2) Bring to call: pen & paper to take notes

(3) Time: 9:00 - 10:00 PM EST
(Call in by 8:55pm. We begin promptly at 9 pm )

Telephone Bridge Number: 1 (218) 486-1616
Access Code: 8767829#

Note: This is a long distance call; not toll-free.
Please do not give out the telephone bridge number to other
folks.

4) Tele-Etiquettes for everyone's enjoyment on call:

i) Preference is to use a regular land phone rather than a cell
or mobile phone
ii) Be in a quiet place, away from "happy" background noises -
pets, kids, tv etc.
iii) Identify yourself when you share
iv) Actively participate

*******************************************************

About Suzy Spivey:

www.suzyspivey.com
email: suzy@suzyspivey.com

Suzy brings contagious enthusiasm, passion & purpose as a Certified Dream Coach™, Certified Dance Instructor, TV Host & Producer, & Inspirational Speaker. 

Suzy was personally trained by Marcia Wieder, America’s Dream Coach & founder of Dream University (& personal coach to Jack Canfield). Her life purpose training was with Tim Kelly, founder of The True Purpose Institute. She has also trained in Voice Dialogue facilitation with Carole Kammen, founder of Pathways Institute. 

Suzy raises her clients' vibration through JourneyDance, a powerful expressive movement process, for mind-body-soul integration, that taps into their bliss. She studied with Toni Bergens, renowned creator of JourneyDance™.

She also uniquely integrates Dream Coach® Method & JourneyDance™, two renowned, holistic systems, in a body-mind-soul way, that accelerate your intentions (of your dreams) into action, & make it happen!

If you are in transition, feel stuck, or looking to make your dreams come true, contact Suzy for help in making the shift to move you forward.

group.name: The Boston Law of Attraction Meetup Group

item.name: TELE-Meetup: Mastermind with Suzy Spivey: A.C.T. on your Dreams
